description: This file defines a React context for managing a shopping cart in a bookstore frontend. It provides a context provider component `CartProvider` that manages cart state with localStorage persistence, and a hook `useCart` for components to access cart state and actions.

methods.name: CartProvider
methods.description: React component that provides cart state and actions with localStorage persistence for its children.

methods.name: useCart
methods.description: Hook for accessing cart state and actions within components that are children of CartProvider.
